sentences.en: a major scandal involving the government
sentences.cn: 涉及政府的一桩重大丑闻

sentences.en: a series of financial scandals
sentences.cn: 一连串金融丑闻

sentences.en: a sex scandal that ruined his reputation
sentences.cn: 让他名誉扫地的性丑闻

sentences.en: After the scandal was exposed, Dr Bailey committed suicide.
sentences.cn: 丑闻曝光后，贝利博士自杀了。

sentences.en: Am I alone in thinking that this scandal should finish his career?
sentences.cn: 只有我认为这件丑闻会断送他的事业吗？

sentences.en: Do you realize, woman, the scandal and publicity that will be involved?
sentences.cn: 臭婆娘，你知不知道这会恶名远扬？

sentences.en: He has been at the centre of a political scandal .
sentences.cn: 他成了一桩政治丑闻的焦点。

sentences.en: He has been at the centre of a political scandal.
sentences.cn: 他成了一桩政治丑闻的焦点。

sentences.en: He loved gossip and scandal.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢闲话和流言蜚语。

sentences.en: He refused to soft-pedal an investigation into the scandal.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝降低对这起丑闻的调查力度。

sentences.en: He resigned from his post as Bishop when the scandal broke.
sentences.cn: 丑闻传开后他辞去了主教职务。

sentences.en: His image was tarnished by the savings and loan scandal.
sentences.cn: 他的形象因为那桩储蓄信贷丑闻而受损。

sentences.en: If word got out now, a scandal could be disastrous.
sentences.cn: 如果消息现在传出去，可能会是灾难性的丑闻。

sentences.en: It caused quite a scandal when he left his wife.
sentences.cn: 他离开妻子成了一大丑闻。

sentences.en: The cast of characters in the scandal is bewilderingly large.
sentences.cn: 卷入丑闻的人多得让人眼花缭乱。

sentences.en: The college has recently been involved in a drugs scandal .
sentences.cn: 这所大学最近卷入了毒品丑闻。

sentences.en: The college has recently been involved in a drugs scandal.
sentences.cn: 这所大学最近卷入了毒品丑闻。

sentences.en: The industry minister described the affair as "an absolute scandal".
sentences.cn: 工业部长将此事件形容为“绝对的丑闻”。

sentences.en: The scandal stories satisfy people's curiosity for a few hours.
sentences.cn: 有关丑闻的报道使人们的好奇心在几个小时内得到满足。

sentences.en: The scandal took a new turn over the weekend.
sentences.cn: 周末时丑闻有了新的发展。

sentences.en: There were fears he would be dragged down by the scandal.
sentences.cn: 有人担心他会因丑闻而辱没了身份。

sentences.en: These mothers often abandoned their children because of fear of scandal.
sentences.cn: 这些母亲经常会因为害怕流言蜚语而抛弃自己的孩子。

sentences.en: They had already left the country when the scandal broke .
sentences.cn: 丑闻爆出时他们已经离开了这个国家。

sentences.en: This drugs scandal is another blot on the Olympics.
sentences.cn: 这次的兴奋剂丑闻又给奥林匹克运动会抹了黑。

sentences.en: What went on was a scandal. It was a disgrace to Britain.
sentences.cn: 发生的一切是个丑闻，是给英国抹黑。

words.tran_cn: 过分地；诽谤性地；令人愤慨地
专事诽谤的人；散布丑闻者
（英）使感震惊；使愤慨；诽谤；使丢脸（等于scandalize）

trans.tran_cn: 丑闻，丑名，丑事，丑行，丢脸的事件，舞弊案件，耻辱，流言蜚语，闲话，诽谤
trans.tran_en: an event in which someone, especially someone important, behaves in a bad way that shocks people
